remarks: Subtraction from both sides of 'less than'.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 30-May-2016.)
statement:
leidd.1 $e |- ( ph -> A e. RR ) $.
ltnegd.2 $e |- ( ph -> B e. RR ) $.
ltadd1d.3 $e |- ( ph -> C e. RR ) $.
ltadd1dd.4 $e |- ( ph -> A < B ) $.
ltsub1dd $p |- ( ph -> ( A - C ) < ( B - C ) ) $.
